resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107273</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107273</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keeping the Air Clean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Luft halten, säubern Sie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En gardant l'air nettoyez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mantendo o ar limpe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mantenendo l'aria pulisca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κρατώντας τον αέρα καθαρό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guardando el aire limpie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This item presents information about alternative sources of energy, using industrial control techniques, and the role of tress and oceans in keeping the air clean. Includes great graphics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Einzelteil stellt Informationen über 
alternative Quellen von Energie mit industriellen Steuertechniken und 
der Rolle von tress und von Ozeanen dar, wenn es die Luft sauber 
hält. Enthält große Graphiken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet élément présente des informations sur des 
sources alternatives d'énergie, en utilisant des techniques 
industrielles de commande, et le rôle des tress et des océans en 
maintenant l'air propre. Inclut de grands graphiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo apresenta a informação sobre fontes 
alternativas da energia, usando técnicas industriais do controle, e o
papel dos tress e dos oceanos em manter o ar limpo. Inclui 
gráficos grandes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo presenta le informazioni sulle 
sorgenti alternative di energia, usando le tecniche industriali di 
controllo ed il ruolo dei tress e degli oceani nel mantenere l'aria 
pulita. Include i grafici grandi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το αντικείμενο παρουσιάζει τις πληροφορίες για 
τις εναλλακτικές πηγές ενέργειας, χρησιμοποιώντας τις 
βιομηχανικές τεχνικές ελέγχου, και το ρόλο των tress και των 
ωκεανών στην κράτηση του αέρα καθαρού. Περιλαμβάνει τη 
μεγάλη γραφική παράσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este item presenta la información sobre fuentes 
alternativas de la energía, usando técnicas industriales del 
control, y el papel de tress y de los océanos en mantener el aire 
limpio. Incluye grandes gráficos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:NATALIA CHURCHILL
FN:NATALIA CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107273</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/keeping-the-air-clean</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
